Description: Emit a blast of electrified steam, fire, and wind that shocks, burns, and pushes back all enemies.
Summon a storm of boiling rain, fire, and lightning, driven by fierce winds to devastate the area.
Create a tempest of plasma, fire, wind, and boiling water that incinerates and electrocutes all it touches.
Summon a typhoon charged with fire, water, and lightning, tearing through the battlefield with chaotic fury.
Unleash the combined fury of fire, water, air, earth, and lightning, creating an elemental storm that obliterates everything.
